posts.title: KAREN THOMAS-BUENO - missed connections
posts.body: You were billed as The Georgia Peach. You worked at the Gaity Theatre when it was a strip club in 1971. We met when a car rear-ended my car in front of the theatre. You ran over and diffused a fight. We saw each other a few times after that. Just wondering if you are still alive. I moved down to Miami soon after, and lost touch. I remember you were friends with Brandy Stevens, who I ran into in Miami Beach in the fall of 1971.
